CustomField.description: If selected, the Utilization Target field on the Resource is used to determine red/yellow/green colors in Resource Planner, not 100% of work calendar hours.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, the Utilization Target field on the Resource is used to determine red/yellow/green colors in Resource Planner, not 100% of work calendar hours.
CustomField.label: Use Utilization Target
